alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through 600 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orangetree, or 7 miles east of Bonita Springs, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Ave Maria, Naples Park, Orangetree, Golden Gate, East Naples, Big Corkscrew Island, Vineyards, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary and Quail Creek Estate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
